title: 2 Way PCB Mount Screw Terminals 5mm Pitch
blurb: Ideal for those situations where wires leave a PCB. Just solder the terminal strip to the PCB and connect wires. 2 way (HM- 3172) and 3 way (HM- 3173) are interlocking, so you can make up whatever size you require using these - see 6 way pictured.
